attributes.action: strengthen the existing law relating to the illegal act of  badger baiting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'make the
     act of badger baiting a 'notifiable' offence - making it a
     higher prority offence'

     at present badger baiting is an offence against the law - but
     it is not been enforced - 10,000 badgers die each year in a
     most cruel way at the hands of these wicked individuals.
    Please help to end terrible
     cruelty.
